function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of personal information including age and gender","Impact":"Potential privacy and security risks for respondents","Mitigation":"Use anonymized data and secure storage practices","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure servers","People":"Respondents","Owner":"Survey administrators"},{"Description":"Comparison of routes with dangerous points","Impact":"Risk of exposing respondents to potential danger","Mitigation":"Ensure respondent safety by using anonymized data and aggregate statistics","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, aggregate analysis","People":"Respondents","Owner":"Survey administrators"},{"Description":"Website information only available in Spanish","Impact":"Exclusion of non-Spanish-speaking respondents","Mitigation":"Provide information in multiple languages to ensure accessibility","Technologies":"Multilingual website support","People":"Non-Spanish-speaking respondents","Owner":"Survey administrators"}]}
